description: Number of partitions of n into distinct prime powers (1 not considered a power).
links: T. D. Noe and Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000, first 1000 terms by T. D. Noe
prog: (Haskell)import Data.MemoCombinators (memo2, integral)a054685 n = a054685_list !! na054685_list = map (p' 2) [0..] where   p' = memo2 integral integral p   p _ 0 = 1   p k m = if m < pp then 0 else p' (k + 1) (m - pp) + p' (k + 1) m           where pp = a000961 k-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 23 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_, Apr 19, 2000
